text: He saw heaven opened and an object like a large sheet coming down 10:11 to him ¦ --- CTto him. 10:11 It was tied at its four corners and was being lowered 88.6% ¦ being lowered by its four corners ECM NA SBL WH 4.2% [Note: The reading of ECM, NA, SBL, and WH would require the preceding period to be changed to a comma.]It was tied at its four corners and was being lowered to the earth.
